name: Boid Battles
description:
Boid Battles

Controls:
Left Click to fire an attraction grenade
Right Click to fire a repulsion grenade
Holding charges the grenade Scroll to zoom in and out

Goal:

Your goal is to eliminate all enemy boids by leading them into the black holes in each corner of the map with your grenades. By approahing neutral (yellow) boids you can bring a limited number of them under your control.
